website_summaries.verdict: This is a great price for a pair of expertly-designed lion cub plushies, and the cute nuzzling feature is adorable.
pros: The lion cubs magnetically nuzzle each other when placed together
cons: Both cubs sport a distracting “Lion King” tag under their arms

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My two kids are sharing this set and love nuzzling their heads together (there are magnets inside). Since there are 2, each child gets one to call their own. It’s been great! They remind me of the kissing Simba and Nala toys from the 90’s!! Great memories. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mamabot

customer_reviews.title: They do not “Nuzzle”
customer_reviews.text: Simba and Nala are cute as stuffed animals. But they DO NOT “nuzzle” at all. I literally thought they took batteries and nuzzled they’re heads together but no.....there is TINY MAGNETS in their heads. But the problem is the magnet is probably the weakest magnet on the planet. You have to get it JUST RIGHT or the magnet doesn’t attach and even when it does, it’s so weak they don’t even stay “nuzzling” most of the time. If my daughter didn’t care about keeping them as stuffed animals, I would send it back. To advertise this as “nuzzling lions” is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Cospsuimom

customer_reviews.title: Lions Love
customer_reviews.text: Love Simba and Nala from the Lion King , this so just as adorable online as in person. The new movie trailer looks AWESOME. Thanks Amazon for carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Size Issue
customer_reviews.text: The description states each plush is 10" tall. Those in the set I received are under 8" tall! Had I known beforehand, this purchase would never have been made.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jane Silkwood

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters and I went to see Disney's new Lion King while I was visiting from out of state. These cuddly stuffed animals ( for the price of one!) will keep this memory alive for them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our granddaughter to go with the Lion King (real life version). She’s a devoted animal lover and very aware of textures. She loved that it was so soft and that they could be nuzzled together with the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Dianef829

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my patient and sleeps wìth them every night and loves the magnetic feature of them getting "stuck" together
customer_reviews.author: Sugarluv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and washable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft plush Lion King that is washable! Any child who is a fan of Lion King would treasure this pair of soft plush stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Colangelo

customer_reviews.title: Roar!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. Of course they came with tickets to the show here in Arizona at Gammage . The Lion King
customer_reviews.author: Frank de Cesare

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson absolutely adores these! They are so cute and are great quality. They were a hit for his birthday, he says they are soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality plush stuffed animals. My niece loves having the set so she can play with them. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter, she is obsessed with Lion King right now, very cute and soft, she likes how they can stick their heads together, they are a bit small but I did not read the details about the size, she is happy with it so that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: tammi pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. My great neice loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred Mary Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My wife enjoyed receiving this pair and reminds her of the movie. My granddaughter loves to hold them when she comes to visit. Love to see them on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Veetuch

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas and she Absolutely loves them. Super cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. After watching the Lion King multiple times I purchased these with the book. A big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler niece. She absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Lion king 2
customer_reviews.text: Great lion king 2 stuff animal a great gift soft n memory love it. Thank u

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift someone and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Akeem

customer_reviews.title: Happiness of a little girl
customer_reviews.text: My little grand niece Kennedy Will not let them a out of her sight for a minute he loves them very much

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's fine i kinda like this my son likes it to it's a great toy to play with

customer_reviews.title: just hugs
customer_reviews.text: would like if heads did move away along with make noise

customer_reviews.title: So natural
customer_reviews.text: We loved it. They are so sweet!!!!! My daughter fell in love immediately with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Cute! I used for a add on for a diaper cake I made for a baby shower.

customer_reviews.title: Cute soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 21 year old marine he loves them he watch lion King when he was young his favorite so cute gave it to him when he first came home from his first deployment made him cry truly
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porter

product_meta.title: Lion King Kissing Simba and Nala Plush - EXCLUSIVE
product_meta.description: Style:StandardFeel the love tonight with this sweet Simba and Nala plush pair from Disney's new live action film, Disney's The Lion King! Press this adorable couple's cheeks together and they will connect like they're nuzzling! Simba and Nala are made with Super soft and cuddly fabrics that are perfect for both cuddles and play! Featuring deluxe embroidered detailing and plastic eyes, this iconic plush pair is sure to be a favorite with both kids and collectors! Bring home the love today! Ages 3+ ​
feature_bullets: This product ships in a polybag.
Feel the love tonight with this sweet Simba and Nala Plush pair from Disney’s The Lion King.
Set includes: one Simba plush and one Nala plush.
Press their heads together and they connect like they’re nuzzling!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
